thread.title: Fantastic stay!
thread.title_full: Fantastic stay! - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Triggerhappy68
title: Fantastic stay!
text:
Again another good stay at Euston Premier Inn. We stayed for one night to celebrate my Daughters 18th Birthday!
Everything was perfect, the room was spotless, lovely fluffy white towels & a very goodnights sleep!
Breakfast was so good, fresh and always being replenished.
All staff you meet are always very pleasant.
Looking forward to my next visit!
Room Tip: All rooms are good! See more room tips
